ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The author is indebted to the late Professor Ferdinand Bohlmann for his kind permission of using his laboratory resources during the isolation and structure elucidation of secondary metabolites of Ferula drudeana and would like to thank the Alexander von Humboldt Foundation for the financial support during his stay in Berlin, Germany. The author wishes to thank John A. Beutler for useful discussions during the preparation of this manuscript and would also like to thank the anonymous referees for their invaluable suggestions and comments about the manuscript.
